text: Manipur Polo International 2015 or 9th Manipur International Polo Tournament is a Polo Tournament that was held in Imphal, Manipur. It was organised in Mapal Kangjeibung (Imphal Polo Ground), the oldest polo ground in the world. United States won the trophy after defeating India-B team (Manipur team) by 5-4 goals. It was the first American victory in the tournament. == Participants == * * * * * == References == Category:Polo competitions in Manipur Category:2015 in sports Category:2010s in Indian sport
title: Manipur Polo International 2015
